snippet: As a new generation of men rises into positions of power — helping to relax standards for what constitutes executive style — beards and mustaches are becoming more common.
lead_paragraph: As a new generation of men rises into positions of power — helping to relax standards for what constitutes executive style — beards and mustaches are becoming more common.

headline.seo: Facial Hair Is Back in Style in Business Settings
headline.main: A Growing Trend in the Boardroom
headline.print_headline: A Growing Trend in the Boardroom
